body_html: @zzw922cn I'm a little confused by your suggestion. The current line 295 is about the input shapes. But I suspect that you mean the description of the output shape, which should perhaps be "[batch_size, 1, max_time]" instead of the current "[batch_time, 1, max_time]" (which doesn't make sense because batch_time doesn't occur elsewhere). Have I got that right?
